name: ChangeF5PoolStatus
friendlyName: Change F5 Load Balancer Pool Status
description: Changes the status all members of a Local Traffic Manager pool (F5)
helpMarkDown: Version 0.3.6.  Be excellent to one another.
author: Reuben Cabrera

inputs.name: ltm
inputs.label: Local Traffic Manager Instance
inputs.helpMarkDown: The F5 Local Traffic Manager name (DNS-resolvable).  Examples: *f5-lan*, *f5-dev*

inputs.name: pool
inputs.label: Pool Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Local Traffic Pool Name. This is *case-sensitive*.

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose to *Enable*, *Disable*, or *Force Offline* the members of the pool.

inputs.name: failIfConnections
inputs.label: Fail if Connections Exist
inputs.helpMarkDown: Checks all members in a pool to see if there are current connections active.  If the **Action** is *Disable* or *Force Offline*, and if any connections exist, then that member will not be changed and the task will fail.

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username to use for authenticating to the F5 BIG-IP device.

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password to use for authenticating to the F5 BIG-IP device.  You should probably use a *secret variable* for this value.
